steps: Establish three new entities: a real estate development company, an import-export shell company, and a luxury car dealership
Create fake corporate documentation showing the shell company owns land in a third jurisdiction
Have the real estate company purchase the 'land' from the shell company for $250,000 (overinvoicing property)
Use the shell company to purchase high-value cars from the dealership at 20% above market price ($50,000)
The real estate company sells refurbished cars to legitimate buyers at normal market prices
Divert $300,000 through the corporate accounts to legitimate business expenses, hiding the illicit proceeds
evasion_techniques: Using shell company as fake landowner in different jurisdiction
Mixing illicit funds with legitimate car dealership revenue
